title: Game Programming E-Books
description:
A collection of E-Books dealing with game development, below is a list of some titles:

Advanced Graphics Programming Using OpenGL
Advanced Animation with DirectX
Advanced 3D Game Programming with DirectX
Beginning Math and Physics for Game Programmers
C Game Programming for Dummies
Code Reading - The Open Source
Creating Emotion in Games
Designing Virtual Worlds
Developing Online Games - An Insider&#039;s Guide
DirectX 9 Audio Exposed
Game Programming Gems 1
Game Development and Production
Game Coding Complete
Introduction to 3D - Game Programming with DirectX
OpenGL Super Bible
The Practice of Programming

There are many many more held within this torrent, download and take a look for yourself.
